DOC.brief_summary: This is a single-center retrospective study that evaluates the effectiveness and long-term safety of the TVT tape ( advantage Boston Scientific) in the treatment of stress urinary incontinence in women on a population of 500 patients with a mean follow-up of 6 years.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Efficacy and Safety of AdvantageÂ® Strips in Women Stress Urinary Incontinence (SUI )
DOC.criteria: patient who received the laying of a strip ADVANTAGE between 1/1/2015 and 1/6/2012
